movie_title: People who can taste words - 6 Minute English
introduction: Imagine being able to ‘taste’ every word that you hear. In this programme, we’ll meet two sisters fr

vocabulary.definition: an informal way of saying a silly person
vocabulary.example: He always acts like a nincompoop in front of his friends.

vocabulary.definition: a strong desire to have something
vocabulary.example: She had a craving for chocolate cake all day.

vocabulary.definition: clear, strong, and detailed in your mind
vocabulary.example: The memory of that day is still vivid in my mind.
His ideas were dismissed by the committee as impractical.

vocabulary.definition: the tendency to imagine things that are not true
vocabulary.example: The child's overactive imagination led to believing in imaginary creatures.

vocabulary.definition: a neurological condition where two or more senses mix together
vocabulary.example: The sisters from Glasgow have synaesthesia, experiencing taste when they hear words.
